author: Morgan Winsor
title: Coronavirus live updates: China to lift lockdown measures on Wuhan in April
description: Over 1.5 billion people across the globe -- more than one-fifth of the world's population -- have been ordered or urged to stay home amid the deadly coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Over 1.5 billion people across the globe -- more than one-fifth of the world's population -- have been ordered or urged to stay home amid a deadly pandemic of the novel coronavirus, which the World Health Organization has warned "is accelerating."
